title: Consider Geographical Barriers
text: Think about how the location of healthcare facilities might affect access to mental health services.

title: Transportation Challenges
text: Consider how the availability of transportation can impact a person's ability to attend appointments.

title: Time Constraints
text: Reflect on how work schedules and other commitments might prevent someone from seeking care.

hintAnswer: may not be access to a local $$health-care$$ center, requiring the client to travel long distances to receive mental health care. This can cause barriers, such as lack of transportation for those who do not drive or an inability to take off time from work to travel a long distance for an appointment
title: Identify the Barriers
text: What are some specific barriers that might prevent someone from accessing outpatient mental health care?
choices: may not be access to a local $$health-care$$ center, requiring the client to travel long distances to receive mental health care. This can cause barriers, such as lack of transportation for those who do not drive or an inability to take off time from work to travel a long distance for an appointment
may not be access to a local $$health-care$$ center
